title: OpenAI ‘was working on advanced model so powerful it alarmed staff’
relevance_explanation: This document is highly relevant as it covers the events surrounding Sam Altman's sacking and the subsequent actions by OpenAI's staff and board. It gives insight into the reasons that may have led to the board's decision and describes the power dynamics within the company.
summary: OpenAI developed a powerful AI model, Q*, triggering safety concerns among its staff, which led to a warning to the board and may have influenced the firing and reinstating of CEO Sam Altman. OpenAI's board dynamics, including the influence of Microsoft as its largest investor, and staff actions are detailed, with additional context on the risks of AGI and the company's mission.
